trans-unit.source: The analysis required to generate code for this interface or method has failed due to an unexpected code pattern. If you are using new or unconventional syntax, consider using other syntax.
trans-unit.target: The analysis required to generate code for this interface or method has failed due to an unexpected code pattern. If you are using new or unconventional syntax, consider using other syntax.

trans-unit.source: Analysis of interface '{0}' has failed. ComInterfaceGenerator will not generate code for this interface.
trans-unit.target: Analysis of interface '{0}' has failed. ComInterfaceGenerator will not generate code for this interface.

trans-unit.source: Analysis of method '{0}' has failed. ComInterfaceGenerator will not generate code for this method.
trans-unit.target: Analysis of method '{0}' has failed. ComInterfaceGenerator will not generate code for this method.

trans-unit.source: Analysis for generation has failed.
trans-unit.target: Analysis for generation has failed.

trans-unit.source: Source-generated COM will ignore any configuration that is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Source-generated COM will ignore any configuration that is not supported.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' configuration is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.
trans-unit.target: The '{0}' configuration is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.

trans-unit.source: The specified marshalling configuration is not supported by source-generated COM. {0}.
trans-unit.target: The specified marshalling configuration is not supported by source-generated COM. {0}.

trans-unit.source: The specified '{0}' configuration for parameter '{1}' is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.
trans-unit.target: The specified '{0}' configuration for parameter '{1}' is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.

trans-unit.source: The specified '{0}' configuration for the return value of method '{1}' is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.
trans-unit.target: The specified '{0}' configuration for the return value of method '{1}' is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.

trans-unit.source: The specified value '{0}' for '{1}' is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.
trans-unit.target: The specified value '{0}' for '{1}' is not supported by source-generated COM. If the specified configuration is required, use `ComImport` instead.

trans-unit.source: Specified configuration is not supported by source-generated COM.
trans-unit.target: Specified configuration is not supported by source-generated COM.

trans-unit.source: Using 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' and 'InterfaceTypeAttribute' is not supported with 'ComInterfaceType' value '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: Using 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' and 'InterfaceTypeAttribute' is not supported with 'ComInterfaceType' value '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: 'GeneratedComInterfaceType' does not support the 'ComInterfaceType' value supplied to 'InterfaceTypeAttribute' on the same type.
trans-unit.target: 'GeneratedComInterfaceType' does not support the 'ComInterfaceType' value supplied to 'InterfaceTypeAttribute' on the same type.

trans-unit.source: Method '{0}' is contained in a type '{1}' that is not marked 'partial'. COM source generation will ignore method '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: Method '{0}' is contained in a type '{1}' that is not marked 'partial'. COM source generation will ignore method '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: Containing type of method with VirtualMethodIndexAttribute does not have a UnmanagedObjectUnwrapperAttribute.
trans-unit.target: Containing type of method with VirtualMethodIndexAttribute does not have a UnmanagedObjectUnwrapperAttribute.

trans-unit.source: Methods on interfaces marked with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' should be non-generic. COM source generation will ignore methods that are generic.
trans-unit.target: Methods on interfaces marked with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' should be non-generic. COM source generation will ignore methods that are generic.

trans-unit.source: Method '{0}' should be non-generic when on interfaces marked with the 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'. COM source generation will ignore method '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: Method '{0}' should be non-generic when on interfaces marked with the 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'. COM source generation will ignore method '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: The configuration of 'ExceptionMarshalling' and 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' is invalid.
trans-unit.target: The configuration of 'ExceptionMarshalling' and 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' is invalid.

trans-unit.source: The configuration of 'ExceptionMarshalling' and 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' on method '{0}' is invalid. {1}
trans-unit.target: The configuration of 'ExceptionMarshalling' and 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' on method '{0}' is invalid. {1}
trans-unit.note: {1} is a message containing additional details about what is not valid

trans-unit.source: 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' must be specified when 'ExceptionMarshalling' is set to 'ExceptionMarshalling.Custom'.
trans-unit.target: 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' must be specified when 'ExceptionMarshalling' is set to 'ExceptionMarshalling.Custom'.

trans-unit.source: 'ExceptionMarshalling' should be set to 'ExceptionMarshalling.Custom' when 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' is specified.
trans-unit.target: 'ExceptionMarshalling' should be set to 'ExceptionMarshalling.Custom' when 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' is specified.

trans-unit.source: The provided value is not a known flag of the 'ExceptionMarshalling' enum.
trans-unit.target: The provided value is not a known flag of the 'ExceptionMarshalling' enum.

trans-unit.source: Interfaces attributed with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' must be partial, non-generic, and must specify a GUID with 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.GuidAttribute'.
trans-unit.target: Interfaces attributed with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' must be partial, non-generic, and must specify a GUID with 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.GuidAttribute'.

trans-unit.source: Interface '{0}' is attributed with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' but is generic.
trans-unit.target: Interface '{0}' is attributed with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' but is generic.

trans-unit.source: Interface '{0}' is attributed with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' but is missing 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.GuidAttribute'.
trans-unit.target: Interface '{0}' is attributed with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' but is missing 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.GuidAttribute'.

trans-unit.source: Invalid 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' usage.
trans-unit.target: Invalid 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute' usage.

trans-unit.source: Invalid 'VirtualMethodIndexAttribute' usage
trans-unit.target: Invalid 'VirtualMethodIndexAttribute' usage

trans-unit.source: All methods must be declared in the same partial definition of a 'GeneratedComInterface'-attributed interface type to ensure reliable calculation for virtual method table offsets.
trans-unit.target: All methods must be declared in the same partial definition of a 'GeneratedComInterface'-attributed interface type to ensure reliable calculation for virtual method table offsets.

trans-unit.source: The method '{0}' is declared on a different partial definition of the interface '{1}' than the definition that has the 'GeneratedComInterface' attribute
trans-unit.target: The method '{0}' is declared on a different partial definition of the interface '{1}' than the definition that has the 'GeneratedComInterface' attribute

trans-unit.source: Method is declared in different partial declaration than the 'GeneratedComInterface' attribute.
trans-unit.target: Method is declared in different partial declaration than the 'GeneratedComInterface' attribute.

trans-unit.source: A 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'-attributed interface can only derive from at most one other 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'-attributed interface.
trans-unit.target: A 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'-attributed interface can only derive from at most one other 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'-attributed interface.

trans-unit.source: Interface '{0}' is derived from two or more interfaces attributed with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'.
trans-unit.target: Interface '{0}' is derived from two or more interfaces attributed with 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'.

trans-unit.source: Specified interface derives from two or more 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'-attributed interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Specified interface derives from two or more 'GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute'-attributed interfaces.
